name: My Secret Bistro
description:
▶ Manage your own classy bistro!
- Decorate your own restaurant with loads of colorful themes!
- Collect all of the unique servers and decorate them to suit your taste!
- Explore unknown lands and get quality ingredients!

▶ Cook loads of cuisines from all over the world!
- Provide delicious dishes and drinks to suit customers tastes!
- Satisfy customers taste buds with your exceptional cuisine and excellent drinks!
- The bigger your restaurant grows, the more dishes you’ll be able to cook!

▶ Run your own bistro with fairy tale characters!
-Snow white, Peter pan, and Red riding hood will be your guest!
-Hire fairy tale characters as your bistro staff!
-Get quality ingredients by increasing your affinity!

▶ Wonderful days in the life of restaurant with your friends!
- Serve backed-up orders with a little help from friends!
- If you gather 6 chefs, it’s party time!
- Do not miss the cooking competition held in each of the areas!

[COMMUNITY] https://www.plug.game/flerobistro-en/infos
[SUPPORT] cs_bistro@flerogames.com
[PRIVACY] flero_privacy@flerogames.com

IN-APP PAYMENTS: My Secret Bistro is free to play but you can buy virtual goods to use in the game.
Having problems? Got a question? We’d love to hear from you!
Please contact us at: cs_bistro@flerogames.com

* My Secret Bistro Supports English, 한국어, 日本語, 中文简体, Tiếng Việt, Deutsch, Lingua italiana, ภาษาไทย, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Malaysia, 中文繁體.
* Customer Service is supported in English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Japanese
